data.text: - So, you train your clients to know how to treat you.

translation.text: Bây giờ, nếu đó là một trường hợp khẩn cấp,

data.text: gracefully ask that you call me during my regular hours,

data.text: which is, let's say, from 10 to three.

data.text: Power comes from supply and demand.
